summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Suma financial tracking app - Backend 100% functional, frontend working with minor navigation issues

ui_bugs.issue: Tab clicks occasionally intercepted by overlay requiring force clicks

passed_tests: Business units CRUD (GET returns 2, POST creates)
KPIs summary endpoint with correct totals
Pendientes tab displays 3 pending movements with CRC formatting
KPIs tab displays correct values: Balance ₡131,500, Income ₡152,000, Expense ₡20,500, Pending 3
Registrar tab form inputs (type selector, amount, description)
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (13/13 tests), Frontend: 90% (minor navigation overlay issue)
